title: Katie Price wants Dwight Yorke to have a relationship with son Harvey
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Katie Price has threatened to turn up on Dwight Yorke’s doorstep with his estranged teenage son Harvey.

Dwight has never played a role in Harvey’s life, and it is thought the last time he saw Harvey was when he was four but speaking on her YouTube channel, Katie has now revealeds that she would love for Dwight to be in Harvey’s life./

‘What I would like to do is turn up to his dad’s place – Dwight Yorke’s – ring on the doorbell and be there with Harvey, for him to see Harvey,’ she said to the camera as she had her hair done.

‘That’s what I would like to do and I will do that. I think Dwight should start entering Harvey’s life, it’s been years. How long has it been? Harvey was four when he last saw him.

‘I would love Dwight to come into contact with Harvey, and just stand there, how can you not want to know Harv? He’s so funny.’

Dwight Yorke with Harvey when he was a baby (Picture: Katie Price)

Katie and Dwight had split by the time she gave birth to her first child Harvey in May 2002 and the model has since criticised the former Manchester United for his treatment of their son.

Yorke initially denied he was the father after Katie became pregnant, forcing her to undergo DNA tests to confirm he was in fact the father.

Harvey Price, Katie Price’s son (Picture: Katie Price)

In her book Reborn, Katie alleged that her ex was unwilling to accept her son’s disabilities.

Harvey was diagnosed with a rare genetic disorder when he was born. He also has other health complications including being blind due to Septo-optic dysplasia, he is also autistic, has an underactive thyroid and diabetes.

Dwight and Katie split when she was pregnant (Picture: Getty Images)

The mother-of-five explained: ‘I’d explained Harvey’s condition to Dwight many times, but he refused to understand it and kept going on about him being fat.’

Harvey’s Prader-Willi Syndrome means he suffers from a chronic feeling of hunger, which means he is prone to putting on weight.
